sentence.Network_en: On the doorstep he felt in his hip pocket for the latchkey.
sentence.Network_cn: 他站在门口的台阶上,摸了摸后裤兜,找大门钥匙.

sentence.Network_en: Someone was opening the front door with a latchkey.
sentence.Network_cn: 有人在用门锁钥匙开前门.

sentence.Network_en: At nine o'clock I heard my uncle's latchkey in the hall door.
sentence.Network_cn: 九点钟时我听见舅舅用钥匙开大门的声音.

entry.tran: 挂钥匙的（形容儿童因父母都是上班族放学回家后不得不自行开门）
entry.def: If you refer to a child as a latchkey kid, you disapprove of the fact that they have to let themselves into their home when returning from school because their parents are out at work.

means.word_mean: 1. key for raising or drawing back a latch or opening an outside door
